channel.title: 562 run client.bat error
channel.description:
[s]Hello i just switched to a 562 to check it out, but when i try to run the client i get a error saying java is not a command or xm250 is not rite. i have tried switching to "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" which works on other servers but i still get messed up errors. how do i get it to work? if you can post what is inside of your run client.bat filethen that would be great![/s]
Shit sorry guys i meant runserver.bat my bad mod please move to server help

item.title: 562 run client.bat error
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

Hello i just switched to a 562 to check it out, but when i try to run the client i get a error saying java is not a command or xm250 is not rite.
i have tried switching to “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac” which works on other servers but i still get messed up errors. how do i get it to work? if you can post what is inside of your run client.bat filethen that would be great!

Shit sorry guys i meant runserver.bat my bad mod please move to server help
